results.title: The Girls He Left Behind cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Girls He Left Behind’ featuring Alice Faye and Carmen Miranda distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Four pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: The Song of Bernadette cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Song of Bernadette’ featuring Jennifer Jones and Charles Bickford produced by Twentieth Century Fox Picture. Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Under the Clock cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Under the Clock’ featuring Judy Garland by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Ltd. A piece of light brown tape has been adhered to the top edge of the image to cover session times.

results.title: Aboriginal dreaming stories
results.brief_description: Jointly presented by Francis Firebrace Jones and Paulin Mcleod, these stories are presented with great enthusiasm and in the spirit of enhancing respect for the land and the Aboriginal people of Australia. The story titles are: In the beginning ; Creation of day and night ; Who discovered Australia? ; How fire came to Earth ; Giant Goanna and the Little black snake ; Why does the kookaburra laugh ; Old bush turkey ; Sharing time ; How the kangaroo got its pouch ; The Platypus ; Death of a cockatoo ; Walkabout ; The Bunyip ; “the Wallagara Man.
results.description: Jointly presented by Francis Firebrace Jones and Paulin Mcleod, these stories are presented with great enthusiasm and in the spirit of enhancing respect for the land and the Aboriginal people of Australia. results.title: Manyu-Wana 1
results.creator_credit: David Batty, Wendy Baarda and Warlpiri Media
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Manyu-Wana (A)”.
This program contains the following topics: Magic; number 3; working as a stockman; reading of “The Man and the tree”; number 1; blowing noses; letter “M”; making hairstring; words for ‘wide’ and ‘narrow’; car magic; bat and ball magic. Suitable for Primary, Secondary and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with English subtitles.

results.title: Manyu-Wana 2
results.creator_credit: David Batty, Wendy Baarda and Warlpiri Media
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Manyu-Wana (A)”.
This episode covers the following topics: Working for the Yuendumu Mining Co.; reading of “The Story of the Perentie”; words for ‘far’ and ‘close’; cleaning teeth, washing eyes; fire-making; story about a little kangaroo looking for its mother; shirt magic; number 2. Suitable for Primary, Secondary and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with English subtitles.

results.title: Manyu-Wana 3
results.creator_credit: David Batty, Wendy Baarda and Warlpiri Media
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Manyu-Wana (A)”.
This episode covers the following topics: Children playing; dampers magic-number 6; exercising for health, showing football and basketball matches between communitites; spear-throwing at Yuendumu Sports; reading of “The Story about the Snake and the Mouse”; words for ‘heavy’ and ‘light’; colours; cleaning and grinding of bush seeds for seed cakes. Suitable for Primary, seconday and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with Englsih subtitles.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Batty, Wendy Baarda and Warlpiri Media

Suitable for Primary, seconday and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with Englsih subtitles.

results.title: Manyu-Wana 4
results.creator_credit: David Batty, Wendy Baarda and Warlpiri Media
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Manyu-Wana (A)”.
This episode covers the following topics: Magic; spear-straightening in a fire and hunting for kangaroo; baby magic; words for ‘big’ and ‘little’ using different clothes being washed; collecting red ochre form a cave at Karrku, near Nyirrpi; working at the powerhouse; picking up rubbish; reading of “The Snake and the Goanna”; band magic; Nyirrpi tractor. Suitable for Primary, Secondary and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with English subtitles.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Batty, Wendy Baarda and Warlpiri Media
